descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a complex pattern displaying both vertical and horizontal symmetry, with a green square masking one part of the pattern.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the green square in the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...if replace the green square with what should be underneath it, if the green square is removed from the input grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a green square against the backdrop of a patterned mosaic.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same size as the green square.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...paint the green square to match the patten of the mosaic, like the missing puzzle piece.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a complex pattern displaying both vertical and horizontal symmetry, with a green square "masking" one part of the pattern.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same as the green square in the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... replace the green square with what should be underneath it, if it were removed from the symmetrical input grid.
